alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Custer County through 130 PM MDT... At 100 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Argyle, or 13 miles northwest of Hot Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pringle and northwestern Wind Cave National Park around 105 PM MDT. Custer, Blue Bell, Mount Coolidge, Stockade Lake and Buffalo Corrals around 120 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Legion Lake and State Game Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
